name: CloneExistingRole
description:
Clone an existing role based on role ID.

This tool allows cloning of an existing role by using its unique role ID. It should be called when you need to create a duplicate of an existing role with identical permissions.

parameters.name: role_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the role to be cloned.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the role.

parameters.name: new_role_name
parameters.description: Name of the new role that is cloned from an existing role.

value_schema.description: Name of the new role that is cloned.

parameters.name: role_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of role for the clone operation. Must be 'roles'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: role_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the role.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the role.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: Name of the new role that is cloned.

value_schema.description: Name of the new role that is cloned.
